page.title: 08Gamekeeping
page.content: There are a number of game copses in the area and a{gamekeeper}is employed to rear pheasants on the Sydmonton Court estate.The majority are{English pheasants}mixed with a few {black pheasants.}Two_week old{poults} (chicks) are purchased and reared in captivity until they are large enough to be released into the woods.The gamekeeper is kept even more busy watching over the young poults when they are in the wild.Pathways called{ {rides}are strewed with straw.Grain is scattered there every day to encourage the pheasants to stay in the area.Patrolling at night is another part of a gamekeeper's job,as poaching is a constant threat. The open season for shooting starts in October,organized shoots are very expensive.Gamekeeping is a mixture of conservation and sport.
